mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blog WHERE comment_on = #{bid}
SELECT * FROM blog,user WHERE blog.user_id=user.uid AND (blog.content LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%") AND blog.release_time < #{nowtime} AND blog.visibility=0 AND blog.type=0 LIMIT #{startNum},#{endNum}
SELECT * FROM blog LEFT JOIN follow ON follow.followed_id=blog.user_id WHERE follow.user_id=#{userid} AND blog.type=0 AND blog.visibility=0

SELECT u.*,b.*, (SELECT count(bl.bid) FROM blog bl WHERE bl.comment_on=b.bid AND type=1) AS reshareNum, (SELECT count(bl.bid) FROM blog bl WHERE bl.comment_on=b.bid AND type=2) AS commentNum, (SELECT count(tu.tuid) FROM thumb_up tu WHERE tu.blog_id=b.bid) AS likeNum FROM user u,blog b WHERE u.uid=b.user_id AND b.type=0 AND b.visibility=0 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(b.release_time, '%Y-%c-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%c-%d') AND b.release_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())
SELECT * FROM user,blog WHERE user.uid=blog.user_id AND user.uid=#{userid} AND type=0 AND (visibility=0 OR visibility=1) ORDER BY blog.release_time DESC
